row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 17)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 15)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 3)
row_desc: Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
col_desc: Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has at least three lip sync wins.
